radiographic_examinations.findings: Detailed structures of the retinal deformities progressing from retinal detachment (RD) to retinal folds (RFs); uniform NFL thickening, formation of 2 distinct NFL bundles, and formation of 1 large NFL bundle.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: The NFL bundles progressed from only thickening to 2 distinct bundles to 1 large bundle.
Unremarkable retinal images noted at different ages (33 and 49 years).
